text: Ivar Odnes (25 May 1963 – 5 October 2018) was a Norwegian politician for the Centre Party. He was a deputy representative to the Parliament of Norway from Oppland during the term 2013-2017. He was born in Østre Toten and was from 2011 the deputy county mayor of Oppland. Odnes died of pancreatic cancer on 5 October 2018 in Oslo at the age of 55.Stortingsrepresentant Ivar Odnes er død ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Norwegian politicians Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer
title: Ivar Odnes
